column4: whenever i click on the trayicon to see my buddy list in pidgin it shows up hidden behind all the other wndows. this happens with conversation windows too ? why ? using ubuntu 9.04 with openbox
whenever i click on the trayicon to see my buddy list in pidgin it shows up hidden behind all the other wndows. this happens with conversation windows too ? why ? using ubuntu 9.04 with openbox
are you running compiz ? if so, you could check via ccsm what level of focus-stealing prevention is active
